sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="x_snc_city_app_artifacts_types"> <x_snc_city_app_artifacts_types action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <app display_value="Retail Banking">eebc42a5db7fb600c3beffa31d96197d</app> <description><![CDATA[Any application that offers one or more links to the application source can be installed on your ServiceNow instance. It only takes a few simple steps for each applcation - create a copy of the app, install the app from GitHub, create demo data (optional).]]></description> <gradient_end>#252b2f</gradient_end> <gradient_start>#768490</gradient_start> <heading>Install With Confidence</heading> <order>600</order> <short_description>(TK) it simple for anyone to automate business processes by dragging and dropping activities into the visual editor. </short_description> <sys_created_by>michael.ritchie</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-07-26 19:00:38</sys_created_on> <sys_id>c9895d04db988300d6afffb41d961961</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>michael.ritchie</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-07-26 19:00:38</sys_updated_on> <type>Installation</type> </x_snc_city_app_artifacts_types> </record_update>
